body:
i'm thankful that though i am not usually so excited about a book that i need to read it the day it comes out and in fact have really been meaning (emphasis on the MEAN) to make a twitter filter so that i can get less of tweets that contain: "pub day" #pubday #bookbirthday "my book is out" "represented by" "repped by" "out from \[name of publisher\]" "i know everyone says this about preorders but they really do mean _so_ much", i was very excited that today was the release day of _hey ladies_, which i have been whiling away my last afternoon of vacation laughing along with and which [i recommend](https://www.amazon.com/Hey-Ladies-Story-Friends-Emails/dp/1419729136/ref=tmm_pap_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=&sr=)\* if you would like a small vacation for your mind.\_\_\_PARAGRAPH\_BREAK\_\_\_

\* i only read ebooks anymore but if you normally read on kindle or your phone i would recommend the paper book—the formatting is not well suited to smaller screens (tablets would be fine!)
